vulnerability.name: USN-4457-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4457-1 fixed a vulnerability in Software. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   Jason A. Donenfeld discovered that Software Properties incorrectly filtered  certain escape sequences when displaying PPA descriptions. If a user were  tricked into adding an arbitrary PPA, a remote attacker could possibly  manipulate the screen.

statements.status_notes: Software Properties could be made to manipulate the display. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
